channel.title: Projects on Pablo Mandiola
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Pablo Mandiola

item.title: NYC Pulse Wall
item.description: An interactive visualization tool in D3js to explore realtime tweets in NYC

item.title: Boiler defects prediction
item.description: Application of different machine learning models to identify and predict boiler defects in NYC

item.title: Studying drug abuse with twitter
item.description: A Spark application to identify the spatial distribution of drug abuse related tweets in major US cities

item.title: FDNY EMS response time analysis
item.description: Analysis of FDNY EMS response times to identify patterns using time series analysis and clustering

item.title: Job access effect on housing prices
item.description: Estimating housing price change in NYC based on expected new jobs in office developments

item.title: 2nd Ave Subway impact
item.description: Time series analysis to assess the impact of the NYC Second Ave Subway on taxi ridership

item.title: Environment effect on school performance
item.description: Modeling school performance of NYC students as a function of crime, drugs, and living conditions

item.title: Access to green areas by socioeconomic status
item.description: Data analysis to test the hypothesis that diversity is correlated with access to green resources in NYC
